description.@en: Drop a coin in the well for wishes, but spin a shilling for luck.

criticalFailure.@en: You have made a critical error in your summoning to the god of fortune. You are punished with a setback. Remove one Fortune Point from the pool and convert it into a Misfortune Point for the GM. If there is one not available, you provoke Divine Punishment.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but may avoid rolling a [[/roll 1D6]] Chaos Die to determine whether you provoke Divine Punishment.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, you can restore one Fortune Point to the Fortune Pool, but only if it has already been spent. Every time you cast this Magick, roll [[/roll 1D6]] Chaos Die to determine whether you provoke Divine Punishment.

reagents.@en: One silver shilling, spun in place (expended)
